front.title: Sieve Email Filtering: Delivery Status Notifications and Deliver-By Extensions

abstract.t: This document describes the "envelope-dsn", "redirect-dsn", "envelope-deliverby", and "redirect-deliverby" extensions to the Sieve email filtering language. The "envelope-dsn" and "envelope- deliverby" extensions provide access to additional envelope information provided by the delivery status notification and deliver-by SMTP extensions. The "redirect-dsn" and "redirect- deliverby" extensions extend Sieve's redirect action to provide control over delivery status notification and deliver-by parameters, respectively.
